properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL DURO NA QUEDA SANK IN 18-05.10S 039-21.69W
   AT 060459Z FEB. ONE PERSON REMAINS MISSING. VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
   IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 309/15.
